meanings.sent1: The boy was the wimpiest in the class, always avoiding any physical activities.
meanings.sent2: He felt like the wimpiest person in the room when he couldn't speak up for himself.
meanings.sent3: Even the smallest spider made him feel like the wimpiest superhero ever.
meanings.sent4: Compared to the roaring lion, the kitten seemed wimpiest of all.
meanings.sent5: Her voice was the wimpiest whisper, barely audible in the noisy room.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of confidence or assertiveness
meanings.sent1: She gave the wimpiest excuse for being late, stumbling over her words.
meanings.sent2: His wimpiest smile couldn't hide the nervousness in his eyes.
meanings.sent3: The wimpiest handshake he ever received felt like a limp fish in his palm.
meanings.sent4: The candle's wimpiest flicker barely illuminated the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The wimpiest attempt at a joke fell flat, leaving an awkward silence.

meanings.sent1: The wimpiest puppy cowered at the sound of thunder, seeking comfort.
meanings.sent2: She was the wimpiest of the group, always jumping at the slightest noise.
meanings.sent3: The wimpiest ghost story made him sleep with the lights on.
meanings.sent4: The wimpiest horror movie scene made her cover her eyes in fear.
meanings.sent5: The wimpiest haunted house attraction sent shivers down his spine.
